title: How to write a letter asking someone for help - Quora

response.answer_text: Discarding why you would need to write a letter for help here’s how you do so. Make sure no one knows you’re writing it. Write it somewhere where you cant be bothered. Detail what you need help for with your address. Either delivered it to the cops or to a neighbors house or to someone you know and trust with instructions to call the cops to help you
